area.key: Sorry you can't update without fixing the license issue first.
Are you sure you want to delete?
Add the selected documents to validation queue. Only documents that are published and have a template assigned will be validated!
The selected page(s) are added to the validation queue
To specify more than one emailaddress use a comma seperated list of email addresses.

The email configuration for scheduled validation is not set. Without configuring the email, a confirmation email cannot be send when the scheduled validation task is finished. Configure the scheduled validation email here.
One or more email addresses are invalid
Below you find the {0} documents that are queued for validation.
Are you sure you want to remove all items from the validation queue?
and process is canceled for remaining documents
Items are removed from the validation queue

We are very sorry, an error occured while validating the pages.
Please contact Soeteman Software via e-mail: support@soetemansoftware.nl
The validation queue HTTP module is not running, this means validation tasks will not execute. Check the user manual how you can configure validation queue HTTP module manually.

When you enable notifications you will receive email notifications when errors are found on the site at the scheduled time.
Emails will be send to the email address assigned to your user account '{0}'.
Change email settings for the email that gets sent when a scheduled validation occured and documents are added to the validation queue.
Change email settings for the email that gets sent when a notification email is sent to the user.
Select the mail template to render the body for the email

This domain will be used to generate the Canonical meta tag. Make sure to enter the production domain of the website.

Leave empty if you don't want to use Canonical domains.
Specify a not found page the {0} language.
Add or remove entries to the robots.txt file for '{0}'. When not modified the default robots.txt template will be used. To learn more about the robots.txt file visit robotstxt.org.{1}
SEO Checker datatype is missing from this document type. SEO Checker cannot analyze keywords when editing content without this data type.
SEO Checker datatype is missing from this document type. SEO Checker cannot analyze keywords when editing content without this data type.
When the title from content is empty SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the title tag. Node Name is a good property to use since that property is always required

When the description tag from content is empty it SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the meta description tag. Only the first paragraph will be used in case this default description tag property is used!

Use a template to display the title property in a specific format, used in the SEO Datatype and Library Sample: [#@seoTitle] | SEO Checker [#@seoTitle] | [$siteName]
Placeholder syntax [# propertyAlias] [$ propertyAlias] (recursive)
Fixed properties: @nodeName (Name of page) @seoTitle (the seo title property)

Helps search engines indicate if documents based on this documenttype need to be in the index:

index will include the document
noindex will not include the document

Helps search engines indicate if it needs to follow links for documents based on this documenttype need to be in the index:

follow will follow the links
nofollow will not follow the links
Check this option if you always want to exclude this documenttype from the xml sitemap
Specify the priority for the sitemap from 0.1 (lowest priority) to 1.0 (highest priority)
Specify how frequently pages based on this doctype will change.
When the image for social media is not set SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the social media image tags.

Use a template to display the title property in a specific format, used in the Facebook Datatype and Library
Syntax is the same as the metadata title template. When left empty The metadata template will be used.
The type of twitter card to render.

Use a template to display the title property in a specific format, used in the Facebook Datatype and Library
Syntax is the same as the metadata title template. When left empty the metadata template will be used.
When selected the page will be validated after publish and issues will be added to the issues list
By default only empty alt attributes on user edited content will be validated. When this option is enabled the check also occurs on images created in templates.
When selected all documents (and children) with property umbracoNaviHide set to true will be excluded from the generated Xml Sitemap
When selected the a dynamic Xml Sitemap will available for every site in the umbraco installation. When the sitemap contains more than 10000 documents an index file will be created automatically
When selected a dynamic robots.txt will be available for every site in the umbraco installation
Search engines treat the URLs with or without www as different. This is causing duplicate content issues. Only select ignore when you solve this issue using your own URLRewriting module!
Force using trailing slash in url's (www.example.com/url/)
Force remove trailing slash from url's (www.example.com/url)
Search engines treat the URLs with or without trailing slash as different. This is causing duplicate content issues.Only select ignore when you solve this issue using URLRewriting!
Store domain for not found urls

When enabled the domain will be stored in case of a not found url. This allows you to redirect to a different page for different domains(www.example.com/contact and clients.example.com/contact).

The domain can be removed or added manually when editing the redirect.
Store querystring for not found urls

When enabled the querystring from the original request will be stored in case of a not found url. This allows you to redirect the same page with a different querystring to a different umbraco page. For example /page.php?id=234 redirect to /news/ and page.php?id=432 redirects to /contact/

The querystring can be removed or added manually when editing the redirect.
When enabled the querystring from the original request will be forwarded to the redirect page.
When enabled Seochecker will check for a redirect, even when the page exists. When not selected SEOChecker only checks for a redirect when the requested page could not be found.
Add the twitter account of the organization here. This will be used for twittercard.
When specified the Facebook App Id be rendered as page metadata.
When selected twittercard properties will be generated and you can specify twittercard properties in SEOChecker datatype
When selected Opengraph properties will be generated and you can specify facebook properties in SEOChecker datatype
Leave this option to default ones. Some SEO staff like to use different values but if you are not sure leave it like this.
Give usertypes access to certain area's of the SEOChecker section. Administrators will always have full control.

The keyword you want to rank this page for, example:
Umbraco editor
When left empty the configured SEO title property for the document type will be used
The keywords tag will be ignored by most search engines!
When left empty the configured SEO description property for the document type will be used
The default SEO title properties will be used after first save.
The default SEO description properties will be used after first save of the document.
The SEO description is missing from properties or the generated template.
The focus keyword is used in the SEO title.
The focus keyword is used in the SEO description.
The focus keyword is used in the page title (H1).
The focus keyword is used in the body text.

No social networks defined
Enable options in SEOChecker configuration
When left empty the configured Social image property for the document type will be used
When left empty the configured Meta title property for the document type will be used
When left empty the configured Meta title property for the document type will be used
When left empty the configured Meta description property for the document type will be used
When left empty the configured Meta description property for the document type will be used
Create, edit or delete redirects for this page.
Edit the old url that redirects to this page.
The old url already exists in the database, you can only specify the old url once
The old redirect where you want to redirect from.
A url where you want to redirect to is required. Pick one using the url picker, or add a url to the redirect to url field
Specify a node you want to redirect to. If the page you want to redirect to can't be selected via a node use the Redirect to Url textbox.
Specify the url you want to redirect to. Only use this when the page you want to redirect to can't be selected via the node picker!
Only redirect when the url comes from the specified domain
Only redirect when the querystring from the url matches the specified querystring parameter(s)
The redirect is removed from the database
The redirect is saved in the database

Helps search engines indicate if documents based on this documenttype need to be in the index:

inherit will use the configured value on the document type.
index will include the document
noindex will not include the document

Helps search engines indicate if it needs to follow links for documents based on this documenttype need to be in the index:

inherit will use the configured value on the document type.
follow will follow the links.
nofollow will not follow the links.

Specify the priority for the sitemap from 0.1 (lowest priority) to 1.0 (highest priority).

Inherit will use the configured value on the document type.

Specify how frequently pages based on this doctype will change.

Inherit will use the configured value on the document type.
The SEO description doesn't contain the focus keyword
The SEO description should not be longer than 160 characters
The SEO title doesn't contain the focus keyword
The SEO title should not be longer than 65 characters
The url doesn't contain the focus keyword

Link: {1}

The url {0} throws an exception.
Link: {1}

The link to url {0} is broken.

Document contains a lot of comments.
The viewstate on the page is too long.

The Description meta tag is missing in the template.
Google analytics isn't (correctly) setup for this template.
The title attribute for the link to {0} is missing.
Multiple H1 tags found on this page. Although it's valid, a page should ideally only have one H1 tag. Don't use the H1 tag too much.
The robots.txt file can not be found. Enable the auto robots.txt option in the configuration screen, or add a robots.txt file to the site.
Robots.txt file could not be found.
The document contains "Lorem ipsum" test content.
The SEO description should be descriptive and should contain at least 50 characters
The reference to media item {0} is broken. Make sure the the url starts with http(s)://
The reference to media item {0} is broken. Make sure the url starts with http(s)://

Link: {1}.
Make sure the the url starts with http(s)://

The link to url {0} is broken.
Link: {1}.
Make sure the domain name is correct.

When a page can't be found Users like a friendly not found page, instead of the default ones.
Create a custom not found page and select it in the domain configuration section of SEO Checker.

The SEO Datatype is not configured for document type '{0}'.
It's not possible to give feedback about keyword usage when editing content without this datatype.
The SEO Description meta tag for this page is empty.

The site is configured to use directory url's.
Make sure the URL Module is running or that you use URL rewriting

The url '{0}' can be accessed with and without the www prefix.
This can cause duplicate content issues. Set the www prefix option in the configuration screen.

The default url '/' can also be accessed by {0}
Make sure the URL Module is running or that you use URL rewriting

The url '{0}' can be accessed as uppercase and lowercase
Make sure the URL Module is running or that you use URL rewriting

The url '{0}' can be accessed with and without a trailing slash
Make sure the URL Module is running or that you use URL rewriting
The reference to media item {0} is broken. Make sure the domain name is correct.

he default url '/' can also be accessed by default.aspx
Make sure the URL Module is running or that you use URL rewriting
The link to stylesheet {0} is broken.
The link to Javascript file {0} is broken.
This template only renders empty text
H1 tag is missing in this template
Search engines like fresh content and the newest content item on this site is older than one month.

It's important to set the SEO settings per documenttype.
These settings are used for rendering Title, Description meta tags and generating sitemaps.
You can edit these settings in the settings tree of the SEO Checker section.

The website is not configured for '{0}'. Visitors might access the website with and without the www prefix.
Update IIS settings so it accepts the url with and without www prefix
The focus keyword is not specified
To analyze your content for keywords it's required to specify the focus keyword
The focus keyword is not found in the page title (H1)
The SEO description should be descriptive and should contain at least 80 characters
The focus keyword is not found in the body text
SEO checker found {0} (other) errors on this page. When running in trial mode only keyword usage errors will be reported.
Error during validation of document (propably a template error), details are logged in the Umbraco log.

The link to the url {0} is empty.
Make sure the link contains a url.

The reference to the media item {0} is empty.
Make sure the media item contains a url.
The robots.txt file prevents all pages being indexed.

The robots.txt file contains:

User-agent: *
Disallow: /

And doesn't contain any Allow element to index a specific folder.
This means all pages on the site will not be indexed and will not appear in the search results.
The robots.txt file prevents all pages being indexed by Google.

The robots.txt file contains:

User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: /

And doesn't contain any Allow element to index a specific folder.
This means all pages on the site will not be indexed by Googlebot and will not appear in the Google search results.
The robots meta tag on the homepage prevents all child pages being indexed.

The Robots meta tag (meta name="robots") contains nofollow.
This means search engines will not follow links from the homepage and no child pages will appear in the search results.
Sorry SEO checker can't validate the page because at least one parent should have a published version.
This page is protected and cannot be validated.
